content.text:
# National Economic Council (United Kingdom)

The National Economic Council is a Cabinet committee in the UK Government created in 2008, replacing the Economic Development Committee.
References
External links
* [http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17067 Press release on number 10 website]
* [http://www.cabinetoffice.gov.uk/secretariats/committees/nec.aspx National Economic Council webpage on the Cabinet Office website]
